hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh

Class IndexedTriangleMeshImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh.PointListImpl
      • hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh.IndexedTriangleMeshImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexedTriangleMesh, PointList, TriangleMesh

    public class IndexedTriangleMeshImpl
extends PointListImpl
implements IndexedTriangleMesh
    An implementation of IndexTriangleMesh which stores the points as a list of Vector3 and the triangles as a list of point index triples.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba

      Returns the index of the specified vertex.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IndexedTriangleMeshImpl

        public IndexedTriangleMeshImpl(List<Vector3> points,
                       List<int[]> triangles)
        Creates a new instance with the specified data. Both lists will be stored by reference. No further operations on these objects should be performed.
        Parameters:
        points - the points of the mesh
        triangles - the triangles specified by point index triples
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either argument or an element of either list is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if an array in the triangle list has a length different from 3
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if a point index is out of range
